titleStmt.title: Londons vacation, and the countries tearme. Or, A lamentable relation of severall remarkable passages which it hath pleased the Lord to shew on severall persons both in London, and the country in this present visitation, 1636. with the number of those thay dyed at London and Newcastle, this present yeare. With new additions. By H.C.
Londons vacation, and the countries tearme.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, Humphrey, fl. 1635-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Harper, and are to be sold at his shop in Smithfield, at the Hospitall Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Smithfield, at the Hospitall Gate
